definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The simplest rag-rugs are made with strips of fabric plaited together.
sentences.chinese: 最簡單的碎布地毯是由碎布條編在一起製成的。
